common.claim: Your opinion matters. Get paid to share your experiences and make an impact on products you love and care about.

demographics.noneOrNoTell: None of the above / I prefer not to say

paypal.title: We use PayPal to pay our participants
paypal.description: Make sure your email has a PayPal account associated. Remember that you can always create one for free!

emailNotifications.title: Email notifications

mkt.title: Newsletter and marketing communications
mkt.description:
We may occasionally send you:

-  Updates on how your opinion is impacting the products you love.
-  A few tips on how to become a master of giving feedback.

studyInvites.title: Invitations to user experience studies
studyInvites.description:
Receive invitations to user experience studies that:

-  You can take remotely, from the comfort of your home.
-  Take an average of 10-20 min to answer.
-  Pay {{tolIncentive}} on average for studies that record audio and video. For standard surveys, the payment is {{surveyIncentive}} on average.

confirmationModal.title: Are you sure?
confirmationModal.description: If you deactivate this option you will no longer receive invitations to paid studies.

emailNotifications.description:
###Hello

These are the communications you’re subscribed to:

emailNotifications.descriptionEveningName:
###Good evening {{userName}},

These are the communications you’re subscribed to:

cardSort.title: Card Sort
cardSort.description:
In these kind of studies we're mostly interested in how you would group certain items. This helps the study creator understand the users train of thought when categorizing.

Remember, there are no wrong answers. We're only interested in your honest opinion.

practice.title: Practice study
practice.description:
Take this practice study and master the art of giving feedback.

If you participate and pass our review, we'll be able to invite you to better paid studies.

survey.description:
A standard question-answer survey. No special effects.

Remember, there are no wrong answers. We're only interested in your honest opinion.
survey.title: Survey

taskBased.title: Task Based
taskBased.description:
In a task based, pretty much as the name states, the study will guide you through a set of tasks for you to complete.

Some tasks are simple, some are a bit more complex. We're interested in knowing how easy or difficult you find them.

Remember, there are no wrong answers. We're only interested in your honest opinion.

tol.title: Think Out Loud
tol.description:
These kind of studies require you to speak your thoughts while you perform tasks.

Remember, there are no wrong answers. When we show you an idea, design or concept, if you hate it you hate it, if you love it you love it, if it doesn't spark any emotion and it's pretty much a waste of time... say so too!

We're only interested in your honest opinion.

requirements.maybeRecorded: You won't need a webcam or microphone, but your screen may be recorded. Be sure to read each task and do your best to complete them.
requirements.screener: You may be asked a few questions to see if you qualify for this study, good luck! :)
requirements.title: For this study you will need:

manualSourcing.title: Stay tuned to your email!
manualSourcing.description:
For studies in {{country}} we use emails to manage our invitations.

To ensure you're invited as often as possible, make sure to keep your profile complete and updated.

treeTest.title: Tree Test
treeTest.description:
In these kind of studies we're trying to find the best possible organization and naming for navigation menus.

Meaning, if the categories make sense for you and if the items are where you're expecting them to be.

Remember, there are no wrong answers. We're only interested in your honest opinion.

clickTest.title: Click Test
clickTest.description:
With a Click Test we want to understand where would you click when we ask you to do a certain action.

Remember, there are no wrong answers. We're only interested in your honest opinion.
